name: 利亚姆·卡罗尔
name_full: 利亚姆·卡罗尔 Liam Carroll

last_movies.title: Comedy Gold: TV Funniest Ever Sketches

introduction: Liam Carroll began performing on stage at Family Theater, Inc. in Hermosa Beach when he was 10 years old. He started his television career in 2014 with a role on The Neighbors before booking a lead role on the upcoming TBS series The Detour opposite Jason Jones.Liam is from Manhattan Beach, California. In addition to acting, he is an avid hockey fan (his dog Stanley is named after the Stanley Cup) and he has played for the Junior Kings for six years. In his spare time, he enjoys jumping on the trampoline with siblings as well as body surfing, skate boarding and playing soccer. Other hobbies include mixing music, doing graffiti art and making short movies with his advanced film class at his middle school.
